name: Gloomhaven
premise: Players will take on the role of a wandering adventurer with their own special set of skills and their own reasons for traveling to this dark corner of the world.
description: Gloomhaven is a game of Euro-inspired tactical combat in a persistent world of shifting motives.
session_playtime_notes: Playtime can extend depending on players' decisions and discussion.
immersiveness_level_notes: Gloomhaven's rich story and world-building provides a high level of immersiveness.
learning_curve_notes: Given the depth of the mechanics, expect several sessions to fully grasp the rules.
save_mechanism: Scenario and campaign progress
save_mechanism_notes: Players' decisions carry over and affect the world and story.
how_to_win: Complete the objectives for a given scenario.
how_to_lose: All characters are exhausted or certain scenario-specific conditions are not met.

reasons: Deep tactical gameplay
Variety of classes and abilities
Immersive world and narrative
Player decisions impact the story

name: Sleeping Gods
premise: Embark on an epic adventure as the crew members of a ship exploring mysterious and dangerous waters.
description: Experience an immersive and deeply narrative-driven adventure in Sleeping Gods. Make impactful choices as you explore a richly themed and imaginative world. With a campaign-based structure and open-world feel, this game offers hours of strategic gameplay. Recommended for 3-4 players.
save_mechanism: Game progress is saved through a logbook and card system
how_to_win: Accomplish key objectives and make strategic choices throughout the campaign
how_to_lose: Fail to complete critical objectives or meet certain conditions
possible_campaigns: Multiple campaign options with varying storylines and objectives

reasons: Adventurous individuals enjoy immersive storytelling and making impactful choices.
They seek excitement, exploration, and are willing to take risks to experience new things.
Strategic players appreciate complex gameplay mechanics and enjoy planning and decision-making to achieve their goals.
They thrive on analyzing and executing effective strategies.
Fantasy enthusiasts are drawn to richly themed and imaginative worlds.
They appreciate the fantastical elements, mythical creatures, and the ability to immerse themselves in an imaginative narrative.

name: Near and Far
premise: Embark on an adventure and race to accomplish various goals in a game that blends storytelling and strategy.
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure in Near and Far, where strategic choices and captivating storytelling take center stage. Explore diverse landscapes, encounter fascinating characters, and make decisions that shape your journey. With a campaign-based structure and immersive narrative, Near and Far offers a unique blend of adventure and strategy. Recommended for 3-4 players.
save_mechanism: Game progress is recorded on character sheets
how_to_win: Accomplish various goals and objectives before other players

name: Stuffed Fables
premise: Embark on a whimsical adventure as stuffed animals come to life in a story-driven game.
description: Delve into the magical world of Stuffed Fables, where your plush companions spring to life. Join a group of stuffed animals on an imaginative journey filled with wonder, danger, and discovery. With its unique narrative-driven gameplay and beautifully illustrated storybook, Stuffed Fables offers a delightful experience for players of all ages. Recommended for 2-4 players.
save_mechanism: Game progress is saved by bookmarking the storybook
how_to_win: Complete story objectives and overcome challenges
how_to_lose: Fail to achieve story objectives or meet certain conditions

reasons: Family-oriented players enjoy games that can be enjoyed by both kids and adults.
They appreciate engaging storytelling and cooperative gameplay that fosters family bonds and teamwork.
Creative players are drawn to imaginative and whimsical settings.
They enjoy exploring stories and using their creativity to overcome challenges.
Casual gamers prefer games with easy-to-learn rules and shorter playtimes.
They appreciate games that offer a balance of fun, strategy, and accessibility.

name: Familiar Tales
premise: Embark on a cooperative storytelling adventure with your friends as you shape the narrative together.
description: Unleash your creativity in Familiar Tales, a unique storytelling game that allows players to craft their own narrative journeys. Dive into immersive and collaborative storytelling experiences, where every decision and choice shapes the unfolding story. With its flexible gameplay and endless storytelling possibilities, Familiar Tales offers a dynamic and engaging experience. Recommended for 3-5 players.
save_mechanism: Game progress can be easily saved by taking notes or recording the story progression
how_to_win: Collaboratively create a satisfying and engaging story
how_to_lose: The game does not have a specific win/lose condition; focus is on crafting an enjoyable narrative

reasons: Creative players thrive on open-ended storytelling experiences.
They enjoy using their imagination to shape and craft narratives.
Collaborative players enjoy working together to create a shared story.
They appreciate the social interaction and collective creativity that comes with cooperative storytelling.
Narrative enthusiasts are drawn to games with strong storytelling elements.
They appreciate engaging narratives and enjoy immersing themselves in imaginative worlds.

name: Forgotten Waters
premise: Set sail on a pirate adventure and navigate the treacherous waters in search of fame and fortune.
description: Embark on a swashbuckling adventure in Forgotten Waters, a narrative-driven pirate game filled with thrilling tales, pirate lore, and daring escapades. Experience the life of a pirate as you make crucial decisions, face challenges, and uncover hidden treasures. With its immersive storytelling and cooperative gameplay, Forgotten Waters offers a unique pirate-themed experience. Recommended for 3-7 players.
save_mechanism: Game progress can be easily saved through a logbook system
how_to_win: Accomplish individual and group objectives throughout the pirate adventure
how_to_lose: Fail to complete critical objectives or meet certain conditions

reasons: Adventurous individuals enjoy immersive storytelling and making impactful choices.
They seek excitement, exploration, and are willing to take risks to experience new things.
Thematic enthusiasts appreciate games with strong thematic elements and immersive experiences.
They enjoy being transported to different worlds and engaging in rich narratives.
Cooperative gamers enjoy working together with others towards a common goal.
They appreciate the teamwork, coordination, and shared decision-making aspects of cooperative games.

name: Oath
premise: Enter a realm of shifting power, politics, and destiny as you compete to become the ruler of the land.
description: Immerse yourself in the ever-changing world of Oath, a unique campaign-driven game of politics, exploration, and empire-building. Navigate the intricacies of a dynamic game world where each decision and action has consequences. Shape the fate of the land, forge alliances, and unravel the mysteries of the past. With its innovative gameplay and rich narrative, Oath offers a captivating and replayable experience. Recommended for 1-6 players.
session_playtime_notes: Variable depending on the campaign length and player count
possible_campaigns: Multiple campaign options with varying lengths and objectives
save_mechanism: Game progress can be saved by recording the state of the game board, player positions, and card ownership
how_to_win: Accumulate the most victory points through strategic actions, control of key areas, and fulfilling the Oath's conditions
how_to_lose: Lose control over key areas, fail to fulfill the Oath's conditions, or be overtaken by opponents

reasons: Strategic thinkers enjoy analyzing game systems and planning their moves in advance.
They appreciate games that offer depth, meaningful choices, and opportunities for strategic decision-making.
Diplomatic players excel at negotiating and forging alliances in game situations.
They enjoy the social interaction and negotiation aspects of games that involve player interaction.
Campaign enthusiasts are drawn to games with evolving narratives and persistent game worlds.
They enjoy the long-term storytelling and progression that comes with campaign-style gameplay.

name: 7 Wonders: Duel
premise: Lead your civilization to greatness by constructing architectural wonders, advancing technologies, and outmaneuvering your opponent.
description: 7 Wonders: Duel is a two-player card game that condenses the epic civilization-building experience of the original 7 Wonders game into an intense strategic duel. Construct architectural wonders, develop your civilization's military, scientific, and cultural advancements, and employ tactics to gain an edge over your opponent. With its quick gameplay and clever card-drafting mechanics, 7 Wonders: Duel offers deep strategic choices and replayability. Recommended for 2 players.
session_playtime_notes: Variable depending on player experience and speed of play
save_mechanism: Game progress can be easily saved by recording the state of the game board and card ownership
how_to_win: Achieve military supremacy, scientific advancements, or cultural achievements to earn victory points and outscore your opponent
how_to_lose: Fall behind in victory points, have insufficient military strength, or allow your opponent to trigger a game-ending condition
similar_games: Through the Ages: A New Story of Civilization

reasons: Strategic thinkers enjoy planning their moves and adapting their strategies based on the available cards and their opponent's actions.
They appreciate games that require foresight and decision-making to outmaneuver their opponent.
Card game enthusiasts appreciate the depth and variety that can be found in games with card-driven mechanics.
They enjoy the tactical choices and card interactions that shape the gameplay experience.
Cultural enthusiasts enjoy exploring historical and cultural themes through gameplay.
They appreciate games that allow them to immerse themselves in the development and growth of civilizations.

name: Splendor
premise: Become a wealthy Renaissance merchant by trading gems and acquiring prestigious developments.
description: Splendor is a fast-paced and addictive card-based strategy game. Collect gems, purchase development cards, and attract influential nobles to earn prestige points. With simple rules and deep strategic gameplay, Splendor offers a satisfying experience for players of all skill levels. Recommended for 2-4 players.
session_playtime_notes: Variable depending on player experience and speed of play
save_mechanism: Game progress can be easily saved by recording the state of the gem cards and development cards
how_to_win: Accumulate the required number of prestige points through gem collection and development card acquisition
how_to_lose: Fail to acquire the necessary resources and prestige points compared to opponents

name: Pawsome Tricksters
premise: Pawsome Tricksters is a lively card game where adorable dogs compete to win tricks and show off their tricksy skills.
description: In Pawsome Tricksters, players assume the roles of cute and mischievous dogs, each with their own special abilities. The game follows traditional trick-taking mechanics, where players strategically play cards to win tricks. However, in this whimsical twist, the dogs have tricks of their own, allowing them to bend the rules, steal tricks, or unleash mischief on other players. With colorful illustrations, engaging gameplay, and a delightful dog theme, Pawsome Tricksters is a fun-filled card game suitable for the whole family.
session_playtime_notes: A single session typically covers the entire game.
immersiveness_level_notes: While Pawsome Tricksters offers an enjoyable theme, the focus is more on strategic card play rather than deep immersion.
learning_curve_notes: The game has simple rules and mechanics, but the strategic aspects of trick-taking may require a few rounds to fully grasp.
save_mechanism: Not applicable
save_mechanism_notes: As Pawsome Tricksters is played in a single session, there is no need for a save mechanism.
how_to_win: The goal of Pawsome Tricksters is to accumulate the most points by winning tricks through strategic card play and utilizing the special abilities of the dog characters.
how_to_lose: There is no specific way to lose in Pawsome Tricksters, as the focus is on accumulating points rather than player elimination.

reasons: Pawsome Tricksters involves strategic card play and decision-making.
The whimsical dog theme and mischievous gameplay appeals to those with a playful nature.
The game encourages interaction and friendly competition among players.

name: Whisker Whims
premise: Whisker Whims is a delightful card game where players help cute animals complete whimsical tasks in a charming forest setting.
description: In Whisker Whims, players embark on a whimsical journey through the forest, assisting adorable animals with various tasks. The game features simple mechanics, where players play cards to match specific requirements and earn points. Each animal has its own unique task, and players must strategize to complete them efficiently. With its charming artwork, straightforward gameplay, and quick playtime, Whisker Whims is the perfect card game for players of all ages to enjoy a lighthearted and fun-filled experience.
session_playtime_notes: A single session typically covers the entire game.
immersiveness_level_notes: Whisker Whims offers a cute and immersive theme, but the gameplay focuses more on quick decision-making and card play.
learning_curve_notes: The game has simple rules and mechanics, making it easy for players to learn and start playing quickly.
save_mechanism: Not applicable
save_mechanism_notes: As Whisker Whims is played in a single session, there is no need for a save mechanism.
how_to_win: The goal of Whisker Whims is to earn the most points by successfully completing animal tasks through card play.
how_to_lose: There is no specific way to lose in Whisker Whims, as the focus is on accumulating points rather than player elimination.

reasons: Whisker Whims offers a light and casual gaming experience.
The charming artwork and whimsical theme of the game appeals to creative individuals.
The game's cute and easy-to-learn nature makes it suitable for family game nights.

name: Furry Friends Frenzy
premise: Furry Friends Frenzy is an adorable card game where players collect and match cute animals to create the most whimsical combinations.
description: In Furry Friends Frenzy, players compete to create the most delightful combinations of cute animals. Each card features a unique animal with specific attributes, and players must strategically match them to earn points. With its charming artwork, simple rules, and quick gameplay, Furry Friends Frenzy is a fun and accessible card game that will appeal to players of all ages. Get ready to create furry-filled combinations and enjoy the frenzy of adorable animals!
session_playtime_notes: A single session typically covers the entire game.
immersiveness_level_notes: Furry Friends Frenzy offers a cute and whimsical theme, but the gameplay focuses more on card matching and strategy.
learning_curve_notes: The game has straightforward rules and mechanics, making it easy for players to learn and enjoy without complex strategies.
save_mechanism: Not applicable
save_mechanism_notes: As Furry Friends Frenzy is played in a single session, there is no need for a save mechanism.
how_to_win: The goal of Furry Friends Frenzy is to collect and match the most valuable combinations of adorable animals to earn the highest score.
how_to_lose: There is no specific way to lose in Furry Friends Frenzy, as the focus is on accumulating points rather than player elimination.

reasons: Furry Friends Frenzy offers a light and casual gaming experience with its cute animal theme.
The game's adorable artwork and easy-to-learn mechanics make it a great choice for family game nights.
The game's focus on collecting cute animals and creating combinations will appeal to collectors.

name: Puppy Party Parade
premise: Puppy Party Parade is a delightful card game where players guide adorable puppies through an exciting parade route filled with treats and fun.
description: In Puppy Party Parade, players take on the role of puppy trainers, guiding their cute and playful pups through an exciting parade route. The game features easy-to-learn card mechanics, where players play cards to move their puppies, collect treats, and overcome various obstacles. The goal is to create the most impressive puppy parade and earn the highest score. With its charming artwork, simple rules, and quick playtime, Puppy Party Parade is a delightful card game for the whole family to enjoy.
session_playtime_notes: A single session typically covers the entire game.
immersiveness_level_notes: Puppy Party Parade offers a cute and engaging theme, but the focus is more on card play and strategy rather than deep immersion.
learning_curve_notes: The game has simple rules and mechanics, making it accessible and enjoyable for players of all ages.
save_mechanism: Not applicable
save_mechanism_notes: As Puppy Party Parade is played in a single session, there is no need for a save mechanism.
how_to_win: The goal of Puppy Party Parade is to guide your puppies through the parade route, collect treats, and earn the highest score.
how_to_lose: There is no specific way to lose in Puppy Party Parade, as the focus is on accumulating points and enjoying the playful puppy theme.

reasons: Puppy Party Parade's adorable puppies and family-friendly gameplay make it an ideal choice for family game nights.
The game's cute theme and easy-to-learn mechanics cater to casual players looking for a fun and lighthearted experience.
Puppy Party Parade's focus on adorable puppies will resonate with those who love animals and enjoy themed games.

name: Happy Salmon
premise: Happy Salmon is a fast-paced, hilarious card game where players engage in energetic and fin-flapping actions to match and discard their cards.
description: In Happy Salmon, players engage in a frenzied card game where the goal is to find and match cards with other players through energetic actions. Each player has a deck of cards with different actions, and they must rapidly find someone else with the same action to discard their cards. With actions like the 'Happy Salmon' and 'High 5', the game is full of laughter and high-energy fun. Happy Salmon is a perfect choice for parties, family gatherings, or any group looking for an exciting and hilarious game experience.
session_playtime_notes: Each session is a quick and energetic round, and the game is designed to be played multiple times.
immersiveness_level_notes: Happy Salmon focuses on fast-paced action and interactive gameplay rather than deep immersion.
learning_curve_notes: The game has simple rules and mechanics, and players can jump right into the fun with no complicated strategies to learn.
save_mechanism: Not applicable
save_mechanism_notes: As Happy Salmon is played in quick and energetic sessions, there is no need for a save mechanism.
how_to_win: The goal of Happy Salmon is to be the first player to discard all of their cards by finding matches with other players through energetic actions.
how_to_lose: There is no specific way to lose in Happy Salmon, as the focus is on fast-paced fun and matching cards rather than player elimination.

reasons: Happy Salmon's interactive and energetic gameplay makes it a hit among social and outgoing players.
The game's party-focused nature and hilarious actions appeal to those who love lively group experiences.
Happy Salmon's fast-paced and easy-to-learn mechanics make it suitable for fun-filled family game nights.

name: Animix
premise: Animix is a creative and cute card game where players mix and match animal parts to create whimsical creatures.
description: In Animix, players enter a world of imagination and creativity as they mix and match animal parts to create unique and whimsical creatures. The game features beautifully illustrated cards depicting different animal heads, bodies, and tails. Players take turns creating creatures by combining these cards and trying to match their own secret objective. With its easy-to-learn mechanics and endless possibilities for creature combinations, Animix provides a fun and imaginative experience for players of all ages.
session_playtime_notes: A single session typically covers the entire game.
immersiveness_level_notes: Animix offers a creative and imaginative theme, but the gameplay focuses more on card combination and strategy.
learning_curve_notes: The game has straightforward rules and mechanics, making it easy for players to learn and unleash their creativity.
save_mechanism: Not applicable
save_mechanism_notes: As Animix is played in a single session, there is no need for a save mechanism.
how_to_win: The goal of Animix is to earn the most points by creating creatures that match your secret objective and satisfy the shared objective criteria.
how_to_lose: There is no specific way to lose in Animix, as the focus is on creative creature building and enjoyment rather than player elimination.

reasons: Animix's imaginative gameplay and creature-building mechanics appeal to those with a creative and artistic mindset.
The game's cute and family-friendly nature makes it a great choice for enjoyable family game nights.
Animix offers a light and casual gaming experience that allows players to express their creativity and have fun.

name: Sparkle*Kitty
premise: Sparkle*Kitty is a magical and whimsical card game where players break free from the witch's spell by creating funny and powerful spells of their own.
description: In Sparkle*Kitty, players find themselves trapped in a spell cast by the wicked witch. To break free, they must use their magical powers to create funny and powerful spells by combining and playing cards from their hand. Each spell brings them closer to freedom and introduces amusing effects that affect the game and other players. With its humorous theme, colorful illustrations, and interactive gameplay, Sparkle*Kitty is a fantastic choice for a lighthearted and magical gaming experience.
session_playtime_notes: A single session typically covers the entire game.
immersiveness_level_notes: Sparkle*Kitty offers a whimsical theme and engaging gameplay, but the focus is more on card play and strategy rather than deep immersion.
learning_curve_notes: The game has simple rules and mechanics, allowing players to quickly grasp the gameplay and enjoy the magical experience.
save_mechanism: Not applicable
save_mechanism_notes: As Sparkle*Kitty is played in a single session, there is no need for a save mechanism.
how_to_win: The goal of Sparkle*Kitty is to be the first player to break free from the witch's spell by playing and combining spells in clever and strategic ways.
how_to_lose: There is no specific way to lose in Sparkle*Kitty, as the focus is on creative spellcasting and enjoying the whimsical theme.

reasons: Sparkle*Kitty's humorous and whimsical gameplay appeals to those who enjoy light-hearted and entertaining experiences.
The game's party-focused nature and interactive spellcasting make it a hit among those who love lively and engaging group experiences.
Sparkle*Kitty offers a fun and casual gaming experience that allows players to unleash their creativity and enjoy magical moments.

premise: Heroes embark on quests and venture into dangerous caves, ancient ruins, dark dungeons, and cursed forests to battle monsters, earn riches, and attempt to stop the overlord from carrying out his vile plot.
